title: Tribute
lyrics:
(Am) This is the greatest and best song in the (Am)world…
(Am)  (Am)Tribute
 
(Am) Long time ago me and my brother Kyle here (Am)
(Am) We was hitchhikin' down a (Am)long and lonesome road.
(Am) All of a sudden, (Am) there shined a shiny demon…
(Am) In the middle of the (Am)road. And he said:
[pluck] (Am) Play the best song in the world, or I'll eat your souls
 
[strum] (Am) Well me and Kyle, (Am) we looked at each other
(Am) And we said...   (Am) "Okay"
And we (Am)played the first thing that (G)came to our heads
(F)Just so happened to be
The (Am)Best Song in the (G)World
It was The (F)Best Song in the World
(D)Look into my eyes and it's (F)easy to see
One and (C)one make two, two and (G)one make three
It was (F)destiny
(D)Once every hundred-thousand (F)years or so
When the (C)sun doth shine and the (G)moon doth glow
And the (F)grass don't grow...
 
[slow] (Am) Needless to say, (Am) the beast was stunned
(Am) Whip-crack went his schwumpy tail, (Am) and the beast was done
(Am) He asked us [snort]: (Am) "Be you angels?"
(Am) And we said, "Nay. (Am) We are but men!"
(N/C) ROCK!
(D)Ahhh, (F)ahhh, (C)ahhh-ah-(G)ah,
(F)Ohhh, whoah, ah-whoah-oh!
(Am) This is (G)not The (F)Greatest Song in the World
(Am)No, (G)this is just a tri(F)bute...
(Am) Couldn't re(G)member The (F)Greatest Song in the World
(Am) No, (G)this is a tri-(F)-bute
 
(Am) (G) To The Greatest (D)Song in the (F)World
All (Am)right! (G) It was The Greatest (D)Song in the (F)World
All (Am)right! It was the (G)best muthafuckin song
(D) The greatest song in the (F)world
[scattering] (Am)  (G)  (D)  (F)  x2 ..... LUCIFER!
[kazoo solo] (Am)  (G)  (D)  (F)  x2
[slow, spoken] (Am) And the peculiar thing is (G) this my friends:
(D) The song we sang on that (F)fateful night,
It (Am)didn't actually sound (G)anything like this (D)song!
[sing] (F)This is just a tri(Am)bute!
You (G)gotta' bel-(D)-ieve me!
And I (F)wish you were (Am)there!
Just a (G)matter of opi(D)nion (F) Ah fuck!
 
(Am) Good God, (G) God lovin'
(D) So surprised to (F)find you can't stop it all
(Am) I'm on fire, I’m (G)really on fire
(D)Rich Motherfucka, com(F)padre yeah
 
(E)   (F) Aaaaaaaaaaa….all right! 
(E)   (F) All right!
(E)   (F)  (F) (F-pause)
[pluck] (Am) [evil cackle]
[end]
